channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- QRadar SIEM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- QRadar SIEM

item.title: CVE-2018-1728|2024-08-05T04:07:44.296Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 147707.

item.title: CVE-2018-2021|2024-08-05T04:14:39.566Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 155345.

item.title: CVE-2018-2024|2024-08-05T04:14:39.592Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 specifies permissions for a security-critical resource in a way that allows that resource to be read or modified by unintended actors. IBM X-Force ID: 155350.

item.title: CVE-2018-1733|2024-08-05T04:07:44.363Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 fails to adequately filter user-controlled input data for syntax that has control-plane implications which could allow an attacker to modify displayed content. IBM X-Force ID: 147811.

item.title: CVE-2018-1725|2024-08-05T04:07:44.371Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 n a multi tenant configuration could be vulnerable to information disclosure. IBM X-Force ID: 147440.

item.title: CVE-2018-1568|2024-08-05T04:07:43.839Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 143118.

item.title: CVE-2018-1732|2024-08-05T04:07:44.328Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar Advisor with Watson 1.14.0 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 147810.

item.title: CVE-2018-1571|2024-08-05T04:07:43.778Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.2 and 7.3 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 143121.

item.title: CVE-2018-1729|2024-08-05T04:07:44.326Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 147708.

item.title: CVE-2018-1730|2024-08-05T04:07:44.335Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 147709.

item.title: CVE-2018-1612|2024-08-05T04:07:43.912Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar Incident Forensics (IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2, and 7.3) could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication and obtain sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 144164.

item.title: CVE-2018-2022|2024-08-05T04:14:39.640Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 155346.

item.title: CVE-2018-1650|2024-08-05T04:07:43.864Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 uses hard-coded credentials which could allow an attacker to bypass the authentication configured by the administrator. IBM X-Force ID: 144656.

item.title: CVE-2023-50961|2024-08-02T22:23:44.133Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 275939.

item.title: CVE-2023-50949|2024-08-02T22:23:44.080Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized actions due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 275706.

item.title: CVE-2024-28784|2024-07-12T21:17:31.087Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285893.

item.title: CVE-2024-27269|2024-06-04T17:47:00.230Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow a privileged user to configure user management that would disclose unintended sensitive information across tenants. IBM X-Force ID: 284575.
